Posts.Content: savannah11 wrote: I found a lump in July, saw my doc and she found another lump. I had a diagnostic 3D mammogram and ultrasound. The one lump doc found was clusters of fibroid cysts. I was told that the lump I found was just breast tissue at the time of the mammogram/ultrasound. I went for my 6 week check up with my doc and she (and I) can still feel the lump I found; and it is hard and not moveable so she is sending me to a general surgeon about it.
